items.name: Skin of the Lords
explicitMods: You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item
flavourText: The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.typeLine: Divergent Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 69 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3142 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills require 23% reduced amount of Damage taken to Trigger
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits or burns enemies, or inflicts elemental ailments.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 40% more Elemental Damage
Supported Skills cannot inflict Elemental Ailments
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
+1 to Level of Supported Elemental Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Dabbler's Quicksilver Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

items.name: Crystallised Omniscience
implicitMods: 0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
explicitMods: Modifiers to Attributes instead apply to Omniscience
+1% to all Elemental Resistances per 15 Omniscience
Attribute Requirements can be satisfied by 21% of Omniscience
flavourText: That winter, scorched refugees emerged from the shrine,
speaking only in strange tongues. They prayed to a new
symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.

Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
implicitMods: 5% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 296 Mana while in Area
